EmailTemplate.description: Subject line A – New Blog! What is cash recycling as a service? Subject line B – Maximize efficiencies and ROI with cash recycling as a service https://www.ncr.com/blogs/banking/cash-recycling-improved-efficiency
EmailTemplate.name: 04-27-22 BNK 62/64 Campaign Email 11.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: New Blog – What is cash recycling as a service?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Procuring ‘as a service’ is very en vogue. And when it comes to modernizing your ATM fleet and optimizing cash management then you should check out Cash Recycling as a Service. Put simply, Cash Recycling as a Service means you can outsource the management of your cash recycling operation to a trusted partner (like us!). They will take on the day-to-day management, and even ownership, of your cash recycling operation. From CiT and cash forecasting to software upgrades, maintenance, compliance and security, you can sit back while someone else keeps the wheels turning. Read our latest blog to find out more. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
